|cpu1chip1 = Mindspeed;Comcerto 2000;C2200; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 MPCore |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 650MHz/900MHz/1.2GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646E; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00K18JCAU |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== It's a 4-bay NAS. This device has 1x USB 3.0 ports and 1x USB 2.0 port.
*[[Synology DiskStation DS414j]] • [[Synology DiskStation Devices]] •
{{See also|List of NAS Devices|Synology DiskStation Devices}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/8244/synology-ds414j-an-ideal-backup-nas ''Synology DiskStation DS414j'' Review on '''AnandTech'''] • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/7975/synology-launches-entry-level-fourbay-ds414j ARM Cortex-A9] :CPU: [[Mindspeed]] ''Comcerto'' 2000 ([http://www.mindspeed.com/products/cpe-processors/comcertoreg-2000 C2200]) @1.2GHz (2C/2T ARMv7) :SoC: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 2x SATA II, 2x PCIe Gen2, 3x GMAC :Drive Bays: 4x 3.5"/2.5" SATA 6Gbps HDD/SSD (No Hot-Swap) :RAM: 2x [[Samsung]] K4B2G1646E 512MB (DDR3), Linux 3.2.40 :[[Marvell]] 88SX7042 - 4x SATA II to 1x PCIe Bridge Controller :[[Realtek]] RTL8211E - 1x GbE PHY (RGMII), PSU: 12V/7.5A (90W)
==See also== :• [[Synology DiskStation Devices]] • [[List of NAS Devices]] • [https://oinkzwurgl.org/attic/diskstation/diskstation_hardware/ Hardware] *[[Synology DiskStation DS414]] - 4-Bays NAS (2x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Marvell]] ''Armada XP'' MV78230 @1.33GHz Dual Core, 1GB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS414j]] - 4-Bays NAS (1x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Mindspeed]] ''Comcerto'' 2000 @1.2GHz Dual Core, 512MB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS414slim]] - 4-Bays NAS (2x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Marvell]] ''Armada 370'' @1.2GHz, 512MB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS415+]] - 4-Bays NAS (2x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2538 @2.4GHz Quad Core, 2GB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS415play]] - 4-Bays NAS • [http://www.3dnews.ru/905027 Review] :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] @1.6GHz, 1GB DDR3, 1080p
